name: Santa's Secret Gift
description:
Santa's Secret Gift is a game about throwing gifts and avoiding spikes to reach the delicious milk and cookies!

Keyboard controls
  • Left and right arrow keys - Walk
  • Up arrow key - Jump
  • Z - Throw gift
  • Esc - Pause
Xbox gamepad controls
  • Left and right dpad buttons - Walk
  • Up dpad button - Jump
  • A - Throw gift
  • Start - Pause
How to play

Press Z to throw a gift at some place you can't reach and press Z again to become the gift and teleport yourself.
